ecommerce-website.title: Ecommerce Website
ecommerce-website.descriptions: Built many features e-commerce website with product browsing, user authentication, shopping cart, order placement,....
reponsibilities: Built RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express for product management, cart functionality, orders, and user accounts
Utilized MongoDB to store user data, products, and order information with schema flexibility.

minisocial-website.title: MiniSocial Website
minisocial-website.descriptions: A social media website inspired by Facebook and Instagram with features like creating posts, nested comments, 24-hour stories, messaging, and notifications.
reponsibilities: Implemented features such as creating posts with images, nested comment system,and auto-expiring stories (24h).
Integrated real-time chat and notification systems using Socket.IO for user interaction, status of user when them online.
Applied Elasticsearch to enable full-text search across users with keyword suggestions.
Took full ownership of the development process as a solo fullstack developer, from design to deployment

details.frameWork: Next.js, Nest.js, PostgreSQL, Docker, Redis, Elasticsearch

baovethanhdat-website.title: Security Services Website
baovethanhdat-website.descriptions: A security company website build and seo via WordPress with features like service introduction, contact form, and blog.
reponsibilities: SEO top search results for security services in Vietnam.
Designed and developed the website using WordPress with Elementor and Astra theme.
Implemented a contact form for user inquiries and integrated Google Maps for location services.
